original: Christiansson, Erik Holger, jur. kand., länsnotarie. Mariestad, f. 30/3/03 i Osby, Krist. 1., av Joh. Chr. o. Mathilda Nilsson. G. 30 m. folkskoll. Inez Troedsson. Barn: Inger f. 31, Jarl 36, Gunnar 45. — Stud:ex. 25, jur. kand. 30. Res. t. Tyskl. 21, 22, 23, Finl. 36, Polen 37, Danm., Norge 39. Anst. v. dom:kansli 30-33, polistjg. i Malmö 33-34, länsnot. h. länsstyr. i Skarab. 1. i Mariestad fr. 35. Distr:-sekr. i SvRK 36-43, lok :omb., sekr; o. ’kassaförv. i Mariest. f. Rrksfören. f. svenskh. bev. i uti. fr. 38, tax:ordf. i Töreboda köp. fr. 41, alim. omb. i Skövde sparb. sed. 45. Hobbies: ety-mologi, slav. språk.
translated: Christiansson, Erik Holger, Bachelor of Jurisprudence, County Clerk. Born March 30, 1903 in Osby, Krist. 1. to parents Joh. Chr. and Mathilda Nilsson. Married to Inez Troedsson in the year 1930. Children: Inger born in 1931, Jarl in 1936, Gunnar in 1945. Completed high school studies in 1925 and Jurisprudence in 1930. Traveled to Germany in 1921, 1922 and 1923, Finland in 1936, Poland in 1937, Denmark and Norway in 1939. Employed by the judicial office from 1930-1933, Malmö police from 1933-1934, and as the County Clerk for the Skaraborg County in Mariestad from 1935. District Secretary for the Swedish Red Cross from 1936-1943, local delegate, secretary and treasurer for the Swedish Heritage Society for Swedish emigrants abroad from 1938, tax chairman in Töreboda from 1941 and general delegate in Skövde savings bank since 1945. Hobbies include etymology and Slavic languages.
